SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.SCHDUL_ID, A.SCHDUL_SE, A.SCHDUL_DEPT_ID, A.SCHDUL_KND_CODE SCHDUL_KIND_CODE, A.SCHDUL_BGNDE, A.SCHDUL_ENDDE, A.SCHDUL_NM, A.SCHDUL_CN, A.SCHDUL_PLACE, A.SCHDUL_IPCR_CODE, A.SCHDUL_CHARGER_ID, A.ATCH_FILE_ID, TO_CHAR(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.REPTIT_SE_CODE FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO A WHERE 1=1
AND SCHDUL_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND SCHDUL_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) Z WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNSCHDULINFO WHERE 1=1
AND SCHDUL_NM LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
AND SCHDUL_CN LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
